name: VenousFootPumps(VFP)
title: Venous foot pumps (VFP)
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a venous foot pump device applied for venous thromboembolism (VTE) prophylaxis. ),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Device. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a venous foot pump device applied for VTE prophylaxis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes which represent venous foot pump devices which are used for VTE prophylaxis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
